sections.heading: of directors.Unless the articles of organization or bylaws otherwise provide, the board of directors may fix the remuneration of directors and nondirector committee members

sections.text:
21-2962.Compensation of directors.

Unless the articles of organization or bylaws otherwise provide, the board of directors may fix the remuneration of directors and nondirector committee members.

SourceLaws 2007, LB368, ยง 62.
